questiontext.text:
Apply the Aho-Sethi-Ullman algorithm to obtain the followpos table and the transition function of the DFA that recognizes the language defined by the following regular expression: ((a|b*)a*c)*

n Followpos(n)
1{1:MULTICHOICE:}
2{1:MULTICHOICE:}
3{1:MULTICHOICE:}
4{1:MULTICHOICE:}
5{1:MULTICHOICE:}

$$\mathcal{Q}/\Sigma$$ a b c
A {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:}
B {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:}
C {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:}
D {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:}





















The final states are: {1:MULTICHOICE:}

Apply the Aho-Sethi-Ullman algorithm to obtain the followpos table and the transition function of the DFA that recognizes the language defined by the following regular expression: (a|b*)c*a

F {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:} {1:MULTICHOICE:}
